Name: All Trial Balance Accounts
Expression: {DRILLDOWNMEMBER({[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[NET ASSETS / (LIABILITIES)]} , {[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[NET ASSETS / (LIABILITIES)],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[TOTAL NON-CURRENT LIABILITIES],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[NET CURRENT ASSETS / (LIABILITIES)],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[TOTAL CURRENT LIABILITIES],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[Other Payables],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[TOTAL CURRENT ASSETS],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[TOTAL NON-CURRENT ASSETS],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[FIXED ASSETS],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[LEASED INTANGIBLE FIXED ASSETS],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[LEASED TANGIBLE FIXED ASSETS],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[INTANGIBLE FIXED ASSETS (not leased)],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[TANGIBLE FIXED ASSETS (not leased)]} , RECURSIVE),DRILLDOWNMEMBER({[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[Total Retained Earnings]} , {[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[Total Retained Earnings],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[EAT],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[EBT],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[UNDERLYING EBIT],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[UNDERLYING EBITDA],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[ADMINISTRATIVE OVERHEADS],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[FACTORY OVERHEADS],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[UNDERLYING EBITDA^TOOLING GROSS MARGIN],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[UNDERLYING EBITDA^PRODUCT GROSS MARGIN],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[UNDERLYING EBITDA^TOOLING GROSS MARGIN^TOOLING SALES],[Accounts - MA].[Accounts - MA].[UNDERLYING EBITDA^PRODUCT GROSS MARGIN^PRODUCT SALES]} , RECURSIVE)}
